name: Choosing My Religion
description:
Game for GlobalGameJam 2018.

You are a punk who tries to not get squashed by temples and collect faith transmissions from them.

Controls: press any button.

Try and enjoy!

Development time ~40 manhours.

Art and idea: Mažvilė
Programming: Aidas
